inventory_types.description: Determines whether to check for items in the entity's inventory, inventories of powers present in the entity, or both.

process_mode.description: Determines how the item stacks in the specified inventory/inventories are evaluated.

item_condition.description: If specified, only account for items from the specified inventory/inventories that fulfill this condition.

slots.description: If specified, only items from these specified item slots are evaluated.

slot.description: If specified, only the item from this specified item slot is evaluated.

power.description: If specified and if `inventory_type` is `"power"`, the items in the inventory of this power will be evaluated instead.

comparison.description: Determines how the amount of items/stacks that were evaluated are compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the amount of items/stacks that were evaluated are compared to.
